static void ClockStart ( Clock *const   c  )  [inline, static]

Start the clock.

Parameters:
c pointer to Clock

static double ClockElapsed ( Clock *const   c  )  [inline, static]

Measure elapsed time in seconds since clock started.

Parameters:
c pointer to Clock
Description
To measure how much time code is taking do the following: Clock clk; ClockStart(&clk); //code you want to measure const double time = ClockElapsed(&clk); printf("code took %f seconds\n", time);

static void PseudoRandomSeed ( const unsigned int  s  )  [inline, static]

Set the seed for the random number generator.

Parameters:
s seed value

Referenced by PseudoRandomSeed().

static unsigned int PseudoRandomSeed ( void   )  [inline, static]

Generate and set the seed for the random number generator.

Returns:
A pseudorandom number read from the file /dev/urandom, which is then used to set the seed using srandom
If file /dev/urandom does not exist, then time(NULL) is used to obtain the seed.

References PseudoRandomSeed().
